body.p: The Board noted that the opportunity to conceal losses through structuring would be reduced by the requirements of IAS 36 Impairment of Assets and IFRS 5 Non‑current Assets Held for Sale and Discontinued Operations. Paragraph 12 of IAS 36 includes significant changes to how an entity uses or expects to use an asset as one of the indicators that the asset might be impaired.
